summary: Comprehensive testing of 8 new features for Milkbites e-commerce platform. All features verified working via backend API tests (33/33 passing) and frontend Playwright tests.
seed_data_creation: Created test address for edit feature testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 8 new features tested and working. Address CRUD with edit functionality verified. CSV export includes Products column. Admin order details modal shows product images and payment proof.

admin_order_details_with_product_images.details: Admin order details modal fetches product details and displays product images alongside order items

view_payment_proof_button_removed.details: View Payment Proof button removed from order cards. Payment proof is now shown inside the order details modal

customer_edit_addresses.details: Edit button visible on address cards. PUT /addresses/{address_id} endpoint works correctly. Edit modal pre-fills with existing address data

default_address_auto_fill_checkout.details: Default address auto-fills in checkout delivery address field when customer has a default address set

my_dashboard_to_my_account.details: Customer dashboard title changed from 'My Dashboard' to 'My Account'

csv_export_products_column.details: CSV export includes Products column with item names and quantities (e.g., 'Hampers Babka x1; Cookies x2'). Also includes WhatsApp, Discount, and Address columns

saved_addresses_dropdown_checkout.details: Checkout page shows 'Select from saved addresses' dropdown allowing customers to select from their saved addresses

address_edit_modal_prefill.details: Address edit modal pre-fills with existing address data (full_address, city, postal_code, is_default)

screenshots: .screenshots/address_edit_modal_prefilled.png - Shows edit modal with pre-filled data
.screenshots/checkout_autofill_default.png - Shows checkout with auto-filled default address
.screenshots/admin_orders_page.png - Shows order cards without View Payment Proof button
.screenshots/admin_order_details_modal.png - Shows order details with product images and payment proof
